code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import axios from"axios";import UploadForm from"./components/UploadForm";import ReportList from"./components/ReportList";import"./index.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const App=()=>{const[reports,setReports]=useState([]);const fetchReports=async()=>{try{const{data}=await axios.get("http://localhost:5000/api/reports");setReports(data);}catch(error){console.error("Error fetching reports",error);}};useEffect(()=>{fetchReports();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"\uD83D\uDCB3 Credit Report Dashboard"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(UploadForm,{fetchReports:fetchReports}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ReportList,{reports:reports})]});};export default App;
